data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Gnezdilov, V. M., Cesne, M. Le, Soulier-Perkins, A., Bourgoin, T. (2015): New Guinean Issidae: description of new taxa in a poorly known island fauna (Hemiptera, Fulgoroidea). Zootaxa 3904 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.1.4
